about_the_game:
With the Steampunk Pack, discover more than 18 new skins and ornaments to customize your city! Build an aquarium, a steam spa, or maybe the Steam O’Clock pillar to never lose track of time!

Drape your residences in bronze hues with complex patterns, where clocks and gears dominate with various new skins! For your vehicles, completely change the appearance of your main ship with the Nautilus Flagship skin or send your trains to a new era with the New Era Express and Steamliner train skins.

Unlock new ornaments, including:
- Aquarium
- Steam Spa
- Steam O’Clock
- Celestial Fountain
- Excentric Overpass
- Ground tiles

Unlock new skins, including:
- Steampunk Residence
- Unreal University
- Nautilus Flagship
- New Era Express
- Steamliner

short_description: Give your city a more alternative look! Between art and science, the Steampunk Pack will let you adopt a style inspired by a path yet untaken for the Industrial Revolution, thanks to more than 18 new ornaments and skins for your city.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
